name: google_search_console
description: Google Search Console provides tools to monitor, maintain, and troubleshoot your site's presence in Google Search results.

tools.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_GET_SITEMAP
tools.description: Retrieves information about a specific sitemap for a site.

feedpath.title: Feedpath
feedpath.description: The URL of the sitemap to retrieve. For example: https://www.example.com/sitemap.xml

site_url.title: Site Url
site_url.description: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: https://www.example.com/

tools.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_INSPECT_URL
tools.description: Inspects a URL for indexing issues and status in Google Search Console.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL to inspect. For example: https://www.example.com/page

site_url.title: Site Url
site_url.description: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: https://www.example.com/

language_code.title: Language Code
language_code.description: The language code of the page. For example: en-US

inspection_url.title: Inspection Url
inspection_url.description: The URL of the property as defined in Search Console. For example: https://www.example.com/

tools.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_LIST_SITEMAPS
tools.description: Lists all sitemaps for a site in Google Search Console.

site_url.title: Site Url
site_url.description: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: https://www.example.com/

sitemap_index.title: Sitemap Index
sitemap_index.description: The sitemap index to start listing from. Used for pagination.

tools.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_LIST_SITES
tools.description: Lists all sites owned by the authenticated user in Google Search Console.

tools.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_SEARCH_ANALYTICS_QUERY
tools.description: Queries Google Search Console for search analytics data including clicks, impressions, CTR, and position metrics.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The end date of the date range for the query, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

site_url.title: Site Url
site_url.description: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: https://www.example.com/

row_limit.title: Row Limit
row_limit.description: The maximum number of rows to return. Must be between 1 and 5000.

start_row.title: Start Row
start_row.description: The first row to return from the result set. Used for pagination.

data_state.title: Data State
data_state.description: The data state to return. Possible values: final, all

dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: The dimensions to group the data by. Possible values: query, page, country, device, date

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date of the date range for the query, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

search_type.title: Search Type
search_type.description: The search type to filter by. Possible values: web, video, image, news

aggregation_type.title: Aggregation Type
aggregation_type.description: How data is aggregated. Possible values: auto, byProperty

dimension_filter_groups.title: Dimension Filter Groups
dimension_filter_groups.description: Filters to apply to the dimensions. Each filter group contains dimension filters.

tools.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_SUBMIT_SITEMAP
tools.description: Submits a sitemap to Google Search Console for indexing.

feedpath.title: Feedpath
feedpath.description: The URL of the sitemap to submit. For example: https://www.example.com/sitemap.xml

site_url.title: Site Url
site_url.description: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: https://www.example.com/
